wikipedia_page.main: Rachel Prescott (1766 – 6 December 1824) was a British poet and philanthropist. She wrote about philanthropy and good works and left her own estate to found a charity.

response: Rachel Prescott of Manchester published a book of poetry in 1799 which was dedicated to Nicholson. Her dedication was based on their congeniality of mind, and on principles which can experience neither alloy nor decay.
